home.pipeline: I survived the entire pipeline of the advertizing industry …
home.jobs: … working as illustrator, copywriter, conceptionist, project manager, web designer, senior full-stack developer, tech lead, and technical consultant.
home.hats: Over 16 years, I was able to put on a lot of different hats:

designer.headline: the Designer
designer.subheadline: This is where I draw the line.

linguist.headline: the Linguist
linguist.p1:
We teach languages the same way we teach History or Math.  
People who venture into new languages quickly find themselves frustrated because it feels like **too much** commitment in **time and effort**. Some learning apps even make you feel dumb. I believe there has to be a breaking change in _how_ we teach languages.
